films.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
films.description: A young hobbit, Frodo, embarks on a perilous journey to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth from darkness.

films.name: Inception
films.description: A thief who steals secrets from within the subconscious must plant an idea into a target's mind.

films.name: Indiana Jones: Raiders of the Lost Ark
films.description: Archaeologist Indiana Jones races against Nazis to recover the legendary Ark of the Covenant.

films.name: Toy Story
films.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

films.name: The Dark Knight
films.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges, Batman must confront chaos and disorder in Gotham City.

films.name: Forrest Gump
films.description: The life of a man with a low IQ who inadvertently influences several historical events in the 20th century.

films.name: Gladiator
films.description: A former Roman General seeks justice after being betrayed by the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

films.name: La La Land
films.description: A jazz pianist and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

films.name: The Shining
films.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

films.name: Titanic
films.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

films.name: The Matrix
films.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

films.name: The Lion King
films.description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

films.name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
films.description: The adventures of a legendary concierge and his protégé at a famous European hotel between the wars.

films.name: The Revenant
films.description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear.

films.name: The Notebook
films.description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated.
